tool_description: Evaluates frost risk based on temperature forecasts, dew point, wind conditions, and provides protection recommendations for crops.

wind_speed.description: Wind speed in kilometers per hour

cloud_cover.description: Cloud cover level: clear, partly_cloudy, mostly_cloudy, or overcast

crop_sensitivity.description: Crop frost sensitivity: very_sensitive, sensitive, moderate, or tolerant

error_messages: Invalid temperature range: Minimum temperature should be between -20 and 10°C for frost assessment.
Invalid dew point: Dew point should be within reasonable range (-25 to 15°C).
Invalid wind speed: Wind speed must be non-negative and less than 100 km/h.
usage: Input forecasted minimum temperature, dew point, wind speed, and cloud cover conditions. Specify crop sensitivity level for tailored recommendations. Returns frost probability and protection advice.

frost_severity.description: Expected frost severity: none, light, moderate, or severe

protection_needed.description: Whether frost protection measures are recommended
